headline.main: Iran Says Deeply Concerned Over Crisis in Neighbor Turkey
headline.print_headline: Iran Says Deeply Concerned Over Crisis in Neighbor Turkey

docs.snippet: Iran said on Friday it was deeply concerned about the crisis in neighboring Turkey after reports of an attempted military coup there....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran said on Friday it was deeply concerned about the crisis in neighboring Turkey after reports of an attempted military coup there.

headline.main: Helicopter Opens Fire in Turkey's Ankara as Explosion Heard: Witnesses
headline.print_headline: Helicopter Opens Fire in Turkey's Ankara as Explosion Heard: Witnesses

docs.snippet: A military helicopter opened fire over the Turkish capital Ankara, a Reuters witness said, as witnesses heard an explosion in the capital after the military announced that it had launched a coup to take over the government....
docs.lead_paragraph: A military helicopter opened fire over the Turkish capital Ankara, a Reuters witness said, as witnesses heard an explosion in the capital after the military announced that it had launched a coup to take over the government.

headline.main: Trump Demanded VP Candidate Tax Docs He Won't Make Public
headline.print_headline: Trump Demanded VP Candidate Tax Docs He Won't Make Public

docs.snippet: Donald Trump told an interviewer in May that the income taxes he pays are "none of your business." But for candidates who were auditioning to be his vice president, similar reluctance wasn't an option....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump told an interviewer in May that the income taxes he pays are "none of your business." But for candidates who were auditioning to be his vice president, similar reluctance wasn't an option.

headline.main: Clinton Holds Day of VP Interviews at Her Home in Washington
headline.print_headline: Clinton Holds Day of VP Interviews at Her Home in Washington

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton summoned at least three contenders vying to become her running mate to her Washington home on Friday as she closes in on a pick for vice president....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton summoned at least three contenders vying to become her running mate to her Washington home on Friday as she closes in on a pick for vice president.

headline.main: Turkey's EU Minister Calls on Soldiers to Disobey Orders: NTV
headline.print_headline: Turkey's EU Minister Calls on Soldiers to Disobey Orders: NTV

docs.snippet: Turkey's minister for EU Affairs, Omer Celik, called on soldiers to disobey orders after the military announced on Friday that it was seizing control of the government in a coup....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey's minister for EU Affairs, Omer Celik, called on soldiers to disobey orders after the military announced on Friday that it was seizing control of the government in a coup.

headline.main: No Broad Support in Turkish Military for Coup: Senior Turkish Official
headline.print_headline: No Broad Support in Turkish Military for Coup: Senior Turkish Official

docs.snippet: A senior Turkish official said there appeared to be no broad support within Turkey's military for the attempted coup under way on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior Turkish official said there appeared to be no broad support within Turkey's military for the attempted coup under way on Friday.

headline.main: With or Without Bolt or Russians, Athletes Will Shine in Rio
headline.print_headline: With or Without Bolt or Russians, Athletes Will Shine in Rio

docs.snippet: With so much focus on Usain Bolt's injured hamstring and the Russian team's ban amid charges of systematic doping, it's easy to lose track of who could be making the headlines at the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro....
docs.lead_paragraph: With so much focus on Usain Bolt's injured hamstring and the Russian team's ban amid charges of systematic doping, it's easy to lose track of who could be making the headlines at the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.main: UK Foreign Minister Johnson: 'Very Concerned' by Events in Turkey
headline.print_headline: UK Foreign Minister Johnson: 'Very Concerned' by Events in Turkey

docs.snippet: British Foreign Minister Boris Johnson said he was "very concerned" by events in Turkey where the country's military said it had seized power but the president said the attempted coup would fail....
docs.lead_paragraph: British Foreign Minister Boris Johnson said he was "very concerned" by events in Turkey where the country's military said it had seized power but the president said the attempted coup would fail.

headline.main: Prosecutors Nix Bail Deal in Fraud Case Over $70,000 Watch
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Nix Bail Deal in Fraud Case Over $70,000 Watch

docs.snippet: Federal prosecutors demanded an extra $2.5 million in bail on Friday for a Harvard University-educated businessman extradited from Colombia on fraud charges after they discovered he was wearing a $70,000 watch....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors demanded an extra $2.5 million in bail on Friday for a Harvard University-educated businessman extradited from Colombia on fraud charges after they discovered he was wearing a $70,000 watch.
